entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:47 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:47 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:47 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
